actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to modify the proposed regulation relating to the use of the cents-per-mile valuation rule in valuing the fringe benefit received by an employee for personal use of a vehicle provided by his employer.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to modify a proposed regulation relating to the use of the cents-per-mile valuation rule in valuing the fringe benefit received by an employee for personal use of an employer-provided vehicle. Requires modifications that authorize use of cents-per-mile valuation without regard to the fair market value of the vehicle, with certain limitations.

titles.title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to modify the proposed regulation relating to the use of the cents-per-mile valuation rule in valuing the fringe benefit received by an employee for personal use of a vehicle provided by his employer.
